definitions.definition: A current (constantly changing) trend , favored for frivolous rather than practical, logical, or intellectual reasons.
Popular trends , especially in clothing ; the industry that designs clothing and sometimes other related items.
examples: Check out the latest in fashion .
He had always been interested in fashion , so he decided to take a sewing class.

definitions.definition: A style or manner in which something is done.
The make or form of anything; the style, shape, appearance, or mode of structure; pattern, model; workmanship; execution.
examples: the fashion of the ark, of a coat, of a house, of an altar, etc.

definitions.definition: Polite, fashionable, or genteel life; social position; good breeding.

main_definition: ( countable ) A current (constantly changing) trend , favored for frivolous rather than practical, logical, or intellectual reasons.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Popular trends , especially in clothing ; the industry that designs clothing and sometimes other related items.
( countable ) A style or manner in which something is done.
The make or form of anything; the style, shape, appearance, or mode of structure; pattern, model; workmanship; execution.
( dated ) Polite, fashionable, or genteel life; social position; good breeding.
